means: 刺激( stimulate的过去式和过去分词 )
起兴奋作用，起刺激作用，起促进作用

sentence.Network_en: She also stimulated his curiosity and opened his mind to other cultures.
sentence.Network_cn: 她还激发了他的好奇心，使他愿意了解其他文化。

sentence.Network_en: Bears are very inquisitive and must be kept mentally stimulated.
sentence.Network_cn: 熊非常好奇，必须不断地给予其智力上的刺激。

sentence.Network_en: The Russian health service has stimulated public interest in home cures.
sentence.Network_cn: 俄罗斯的公共医疗服务已经激起了公众对家庭治疗的兴趣。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 亢奋的意思_百度知道 ... 亢奋状态[ excited state] 亢奋1. stimulated;excited 亢奋[ excited].
光偶极力属受激(stimulated)模式之吸收与辐射过程。因此，其中并无形成阻尼之机制。
still camera 静物(普通)照相机stimulated 妥激的stimulated Brillouin scattering 受激布里深渊散射.
随身英语:Zzzzz… Celebrating Boredom... ... engaged 参予（活动）， 有互动 stimulated 受鼓舞，受启发 mundane 非常平凡.

list.abs: 一些翻译~（转的~） ... steroid 类固醇 stimulant 兴奋剂 dash 短跑.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... excitant 兴奋剂 stimulant 刺激物 decolourant 脱色剂.
新大纲四级 - xieyuchao670的日志 - 网易博客 ... steamer 汽船，轮船 stimulate 刺激，激励 stocking 长袜.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... instinct a 本能，本性 stimulate v 刺激，鼓励 stimulation n 刺激，鼓励.
考研词根4(4) -非常英语学习网 ... distiller n. 蒸馏者 stimulator n. 刺激品, 激励器 stiffish a. 相当强的.
stimulation level 刺激级stimulator ①刺激器 ②刺激物stimulator ophthalmoscope 刺激检眼镜

entry.def: To stimulate something means to encourage it to begin or develop further.

example.ex: America's priority is rightly to stimulate its economy...
example.tran: 美国的首要任务自然是刺激经济。

example.ex: The Russian health service has stimulated public interest in home cures.
example.tran: 俄罗斯的公共医疗服务已经激起了公众对家庭治疗的兴趣。

entry.def: If you are stimulated by something, it makes you feel full of ideas and enthusiasm.

example.ex: Bill was stimulated by the challenge...
example.tran: 这个挑战让比尔热情高涨。

example.ex: I was stimulated to examine my deepest thoughts.
example.tran: 我深受启发，开始审视自己内心深处的想法。

entry.def: If something stimulates a part of a person's body, it causes it to move or start working.

example.ex: Exercise stimulates the digestive and excretory systems...
example.tran: 锻炼能促进消化和排泄系统的活动。

example.ex: The production of melanin in the skin is stimulated by exposure to the sun...
example.tran: 皮肤暴露在阳光下就很容易生成黑色素。

auth_sentence.content: Our arrival stimulated them in the work of repair.

auth_sentence.content: They are both highly intelligent and conversationally stimulated children.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are both highly intelligent and conversationally stimulated children.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are both highly intelligent and conversationally stimulated children.

auth_sentence.content: In fact none of them was stimulated during this period.
auth_sentence.res_content: In fact none of them was stimulated during this period.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In fact none of them was stimulated during this period.

Sentence.sentence: The experience on Main Street stimulated self-improvement, and encouraged members to take pride in their home grounds and the total community.
Friendships are not made in a day, and the computer would be more acceptable as a friendif it stimulated the gradual changes that occur when one person is getting to know another.
